title: Keep clean, eyes open: your responsibility
creator_credit: J Lyons and Co and Terence Weathers
brief_description: A key to cleanliness film which deals with food poisoning in the home, in a shop, in a restaurant or in a factory. The film explains poisoning - concentrating on germs and makes some suggestions for prevention of contamination.
creator_credit_for_label: J Lyons and Co and Terence Weathers
